name: WiserHeat
0:
”Alexa, set living room to 20 degrees”
”Alexa, what is the temperature of my living room?”
”Alexa, increase the living room temperature by 5 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this Wiser skill, you can now interact with your Wiser Home devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Wiser Home account and discover your devices.

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

• Use the names you set up already. These are shown in the Wiser Home app and can be changed.
• Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group.

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

• “Alexa, what’s the temperature in the Bedroom?”
• “Alexa, what’s the Bedroom set to?”
• "Alexa, set Downstairs temperature to 22 degrees."
• “Alexa, increase the Bedroom temperature by 5 degrees.”

If you have any questions, please visit the Wiser Home FAQ at https://www.se.com/ww/en/work/support/support-center.jsp
